(1019x81+85)/64 mod 64 = 11. (1019x243+319)/128 mod 32 = 17. (1019x729+1085)/256 mod 16 = 10. (1019x729+1085)/512 mod 8 = 5. (1019x2187+3767)/1024 mod 4 = 0. (1019x2187+3767)/2048 mod 2 = 0. (1019x2187+3767)/4096 mod 1 = 0.
